name: The rise of the Zygomites
description:
Rise of the Zygomites is a 2D shooter game where the objective is to defeat the mysterious portals the spaceships are coming through. You must use your space bullets to destroy the portals, and eventually the final enemy, the true king, Malum of the Black Stars.

  • Features:
    Three levels each increasing in difficulty
  • Two unique enemy types, both out to destroy you.
  • 8-bit style music.
  • High scores system to show who is the best.
  • 8-bit style graphics.
